org.drip.spline.bspline

Class BasisHatShapeControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.function1D.AbstractUnivariate
      • org.drip.spline.bspline.TensionBasisHat
        • org.drip.spline.bspline.BasisHatShapeControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeftHatShapeControl, RightHatShapeControl

    public abstract class BasisHatShapeControl
extends TensionBasisHat
    BasisHatShapeControl implements the shape control function for the hat basis set as laid out in the framework outlined in Koch and Lyche (1989), Koch and Lyche (1993), and Kvasov (2000) Papers. Currently BasisHatShapeControl implements the following shape control customizers: - Cubic Polynomial with Rational Linear Shape Controller. - Cubic Polynomial with Rational Quadratic Shape Controller. - Cubic Polynomial with Rational Exponential Shape Controller.
